name: places/ChIJx1GEbqpZwokRzP_eGipt0eg
formattedAddress: 175 W 12th St # 1A, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 175 W 12th St # 1A, New York, NY 10011-8275, USA

originalText.text:
Affable and attentive service by a one-person show! Dr. Nguyen was thorough in explaining both insurance/billing information as well as the medical side of things. During the retinal scan, she went over the pictures on the computer in detail, describing what she was looking at, the risks she saw, things I needed to watch out for, and more. She was also patient when I chose glasses, calling out details like how a lens with my prescription might fit and look in various frames.

Scheduling via text was also fast and easy: she responded quickly and personably! Take care of your eyes here!!!

originalText.text:
My whole experience with West Village Eye was wonderful!
I needed a new prescription/lenses put into frames I already had, and was able to find their office through Zocdoc because they participate with my insurance.
Walking in, their offices are on the first floor, modern and the space is bright and inviting! The front desk was super nice and my favorite part of the visit was the high tech machine they had to take a picture of my eye  instead of putting in the drops that blind you for three hours! I was able to get my glasses the next day and I’m so incredibly grateful for that. I can see again and my prescription feels great. Thank you!
I highly recommend coming in to West Village Eye if you want genuine concern from your providers, personalized attention, and welcoming/friendly staff. 10/10 will be back!

originalText.text:
I had a great eye exam here. There was no wait time and Allison was great! She was friendly and made sure to answer all my questions.

They also had great frames

originalText.text:
Dylan’s professionalism and attention to detail were evident as he guided me through the preliminary tests, ensuring my comfort every step of the way. His knowledge about eyewear and lenses was impressive, and he helped me choose frames that suited both my style and prescription needs.
What truly stood out was Dylan’s empathy and willingness to go the extra mile. He accommodated my schedule preferences and made sure I understood the insurance billing process. His dedication to ensuring a positive experience left a lasting impression on me.

In a world where exceptional customer service can be rare, Dylan’s commitment to providing top-notch care deserves recognition. He turned what could have been a routine visit into an outstanding and memorable interaction. Kudos to Dylan for embodying the essence of excellent customer service!

originalText.text: This was my first time at eye optical boutique and I was totally happy with my visit. I saw dr Kaupke and he was kind, patient and listened attentively to what i had to say. He explained the problem I was having in full details and helped me with what I needed. The staff was friendly, fast and there was no wait time. I highly recommend Eye Optical and will definately be returning.
